title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Saut√© onion, carrot, celery until softened (5-7 minutes).
Add garlic and cook 1 minute until fragrant.
Add ground beef, breaking up until browned. Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in tomato paste, oregano, and basil. Cook 2 minutes.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and beef stock. Bring to a simmer, then reduce heat and cook 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
Toss spaghetti with sauce, loosening with pasta water if needed. Serve hot with Parmesan.
notes: Better if simmered low and slow for 1+ hour.
